item.title: Large number of Nitros Oxide being left, 22nd February
item.description:
Large number of Nitros Oxide canisters being left and dumped along with used balloons. Dumped by cars that keep parking up. Horrible to look at, bad for the environment and lots of kids and dog walkers go past here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tower Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Dead animal in the carriageway or footway

item.title: Vandalism and normalised rogue parking, 22nd February
item.description:
The two wooden posts in the planter have been vandalised and knocked down and rogue parking has become normalised (see photo). This is at the junction of Grovelands Road and Alderman's Hill. With Spring soon upon us, putting some plants in the planter will improve the aesthetics of the area and discourage some of the rogue parkers. Adding a couple of Bell Bollards would further discourage the abuse of pedestrian places. Many thanks for your time and thanks for your consideration.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Aldermans Hill, Southgate
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping: microwave & furniture, 22nd February
item.description:
Over the past 3 months this location has become a regular fly tipping site. I seems someone local is actively using the area as a place to dump large pieces of furniture etc. Are there CCTV cameras looking down Monro Way ?.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Monro Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
